optimize.translation[0].definitions[0].d: to improve the way that something is done or used so that it is as effective as possible
optimize.translation[0].definitions[0].e: They need to optimize the use of available resources.
optimize.translation[1].definitions[0].d: to make the best possible use of something or to do something in the best possible way
optimize.translation[1].definitions[0].e: technical specifications designed to optimize the performance of Windows software
Cash flow should be managed tooptimize the return from cash received.
